name: Darkness (NedStormFish)
description:
You've been cornered by them. There's nowhere to run. The howling of rain and beasts surrounds you. You can fight, but not forever.

A short game made over 17 days for the the AGBIC Jam 2017. Based on this sweet one, by Katayama Nakamura. Also, possible seizure warning. Sorry about that.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • R - Reload
  • Q - Dash towards mouse
  • E - Dash away from mouse
